channel.title: Twitch Plays Pokemon Finishes Red, Gen 2 is up next!
channel.description:
[url]https://www.escapistmagazine.com/news/view/132587-Twitch-Plays-Pokemon-Somehow-Manages-to-Complete-The-Game[/url]
This is going to go down in history as one of the funniest, most random, yet thoroughly interesting social experiments ever conducted. And the memes! Hopefully when gen 2 starts we won't see the same memes being repeated ad nausem like Portal, but who am I kidding this is the internet after all.

item.title: Twitch Plays Pokemon Finishes Red, Gen 2 is up next!
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
There’s already a thread (sort of): https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=17764

Read full topic
item.source: Twitch Plays Pokemon Finishes Red, Gen 2 is up next!
